Entry.Name: Compliance report for Cipher Suites TLS 1.3
Entry.Extended Name: Compliance report for Cipher Suites supported by TLS 1.3

Mitigation.Textual:
Add the following cipher suites to the server configuration:{add}
Remove the following cipher suites from the server configuration:{remove}
Mitigation.Apache:
-Quick solution: Replace the instruction of the directive SSLOpenSSLConfCmd Ciphersuites with the following string:
{total_string}
-Advanced solution: Check the directive SSLOpenSSLConfCmd Ciphersuites and for each element in the Textual section, follow the instructions provided. The separator for this directive is : and to disable an element you can add either - (remove once) or ! (kill) in front of it.
Mitigation.Nginx:
-Quick solution: Replace the instruction of the directive ssl_conf_command Ciphersuites with the following string:
{total_string}
-Advanced solution: Check the directive ssl_conf_command Ciphersuites and for each element in the Textual section, follow the instructions provided. The separator for this directive is : and to disable an element you can add either - (remove once) or ! (kill) in front of it.
